description: A skill for using browser MCP in general, with specific workflows for design critique and front-end debugging

high_level: Collaborative debugging workflow â€” agent handles mechanical back-and-forth while user stays in loop for judgment calls
mid_level: Setup: Observe current URL, confirm with user
Observe: Capture current state (console logs + screenshot)
Instrument: Add strategic console.logs to source code
Verify: Refresh and capture new logs + screenshots
Iterate: Repeat until root cause identified
Propose & Confirm: Explain root cause, propose fix, get user approval
Fix & Verify: Implement fix, refresh, confirm with user it works
Cleanup: Remove all temporary debug instrumentation

key_decisions.decision: Debugging workflow includes code instrumentation with cleanup
key_decisions.rationale: Agent observes existing logs first, then surgically adds console.logs when needed for deeper visibility. All temporary instrumentation is removed at the end so codebase returns to clean state.

key_decisions.decision: Use browser_navigate to same URL for refresh (not just hot reload)
key_decisions.rationale: Even with hot reload, explicit navigation clears console logs and ensures truly fresh page state. Gives clean slate for each observation cycle.

key_decisions.decision: Setup phase: observe current URL first, then confirm with user
key_decisions.rationale: Agent takes browser_snapshot to see current page, confirms with user if that's the right place. User can confirm or redirect. Collaborative approach - not fully autonomous guessing, not fully manual.

key_decisions.decision: Collaborative workflow with user confirmations, not fully autonomous
key_decisions.rationale: Agent handles mechanical tedium (screenshots, logs, instrumentation, refreshes). User stays in loop for judgment calls: confirming URL, approving fixes, verifying resolution. Reduces friction without removing human oversight.

key_decisions.decision: Debug log convention: single console.log with [DEBUG-AGENT] marker, context, and data
key_decisions.rationale: Browser console groups arguments from one console.log() as single expandable entry. Format: console.log('[DEBUG-AGENT]', '[Context.location]', { data }). Cleanup via grep for marker, git diff as fallback.
No consistent pain points yet that warrant specialization. Build foundation first, iterate and specialize later based on real usage patterns.

key_decisions.decision: Log placement: agent judgment with light guidance on common patterns
key_decisions.rationale: Trust agent to decide contextually. Include common patterns (component boundaries, async ops, data transforms, event handlers, state updates) as reference, not prescription.

key_decisions.decision: Design critique is analysis-focused, not implementation
key_decisions.rationale: Critique workflow gathers info, produces report, supports iterative refinement. Output feeds into plan mode for actual implementation. Keeps critique scope clean.

key_decisions.decision: Context gathering: infer first, then confirm with user (required)
key_decisions.rationale: Agent infers app/page purpose from visual + code, presents understanding for user confirmation. Must have confirmed context before critique proceeds. Ensures clear shared understanding.
Save critique.md, context.md, and screenshots/ to agents directory. Structure may evolve as session system matures. For now, keeps critiques organized and accessible for plan handoff.
